content: sleepy owls baby blanket by marie-elyse dugal in collaboration with alley cat yarns ravelry marie-elyse dugal patterns tipoussins projects instagram @marieelysedugal #sleepyowlsbabyblanket sweet little barn owls inspired this baby blanket design i imagined them perched in a row getting ready for one last flight before saying good night this blanket makes a wonderful gift for a special little person in your life #sleepyowlsbabyblanket 1 of 14 marie-elyse dugal designs yarn and notions yarn 600 yards approximately 250 g dk weight yarn sample in silk/yak dk by alley cat yarns colourway au naturel needles 4mm circulars with a 32 cable other notions cable needle stitch markers scissors darning needle gauge 21 sts = 4 inches in stockinette nota bene this blanket can easily be modified to be larger or smaller by simply adding or removing one or more owl repeat for each owl you wish to add or subtract please cast on 16 sts more or 16 sts less depending on your preference i would also suggest adding or subtracting length to the middle stockinette section depending on your preference to keep the project looking its best it would be ideal to add or subtract about 3 inches of stockinette for each extra owl added or omitted #sleepyowlsbabyblanket 2 of 14 marie-elyse dugal designs abbreviations k knit p purl c4b cable 4 back place the next 2 sts on cable needle and hold at the back of your work knit the next 2 sts from the left hand needle then knit the 2 sts on the cable needle c4f cable 4 front place the next 2 sts on cable needle and hold at the front of your work knit the next 2 sts from the left hand needle then knit the 2 sts on the cable needle co cast on pm place marker sm slip marker bobble bind off rs right side of the work ws wrong side of the work if you are new to cables here are helpful tutorials for the c4f and c4b the first two links are for english style knitters and the last two for continental knitters https //youtu be/hfigrfv5j0o https //youtu be/y0y4dakv4oq https //youtu be/jiqfi4mlcsu https //youtu be/zmjuaynsojs #sleepyowlsbabyblanket 3 of 14 marie-elyse dugal designs instructions note that the charts for the patterns repeats can be found at the end of all instructions note odd row numbers are rs row and even numbers are ws row cast on cast on 120 sts using long tail cast-on or your preferred method garter border not charted row 1-16 knit to end of row leaves sections chart on p11 row 17 k12 pm knit to last 12 sts pm k12 row 18 k12 sm purl to m sm k12 row 19 k12 sm knit to m sm k12 row 20 k12 sm purl to m sm k12 row 21 k12 sm *k4 p4 repeat from *to m sm k12 row 22 k12 sm k3 p4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last st before m k1 sm k12
